system.description: All Armory frames are designed with multiple failsafe systems, but VIP clients and high-tier citizenry have access to a special catalog. With dozens of options for over-engineering reactors, itâ€™s easy to make sure a mech can keep running indefinitely.
system.effect: When you Stabilize and choose to cool your mech, you may spend 2 Repairs to clear 1 stress damage.
